ResponseText: Welcome to the dirty secret of 4forums. Archangel ties Christanity, the Christian God and all things Christanity to his and only his narrow interpretation of the religion. To mock him is to mock his God because Arch believes what he says is the divine word of God. To attack his interpretation is to attack the entire religion.
